name: Buy Afro Crypto Punk
description:
It's a collection of Afro-Black leaders ranging from activists, athletes, scientists, entrepreneurs, and an array of different types of Afro-Black figures.

'Afro-' is a shortened term to refer to a person of African descent. It refers to a person who is of African descent but born or living in an African nation.

ACP is a project that provides collectors access to our social/nightclub in the metaverse. In addition, proceeds from this project will be used to develop utilities for collectors and support black college students in financial need. Also, collectors have the ability to request specific figures ahead of planned development for the floor piece up until the 100 piece collection is complete.

The purpose of this project is to spread awareness of Afro-Black people's culture & excellence and to portray Afro-Black people & history in the correct way. Most importantly, foster our future by financially supporting students in need.
